posts.message: RT @Meligy: "@mjhilton_: Some interesting @readify projects now live at http://labs.readify.net... Like what you see? Give http://knockknock.readify.net a go :)
posts.caption: labs.readify.net
posts.description: Readify Labs is where we share some of the technology that we live and breathe at Readify. The projects you find here will range from early-stage prototypes, to tools that we use internally every day. Not everything is fully polished, but who in technology doesn't like experimenting at the bleeding…
